text.section:
In this section, "firearm" includes:
a handgun, antique firearm, rifle, shotgun, short-barreled shotgun, and short-barreled rifle, as those words are defined in § 4-201 of this article;
a machine gun, as defined in § 4-401 of this article; and
a regulated firearm, as defined in § 5-101 of the Public Safety Article.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a felony and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 5 years or a fine not exceeding $10,000 or both.
